item.title: Viewer and Editor Apps
item.description: Viewer and editor apps Basic app structure App setup Viewer and editor apps ownCloud Web allows developers to implement apps for viewing and editing specific file types. For instance, the built-in preview app serves as the default application for opening media files like images, videos, or audio. This section will guide you through the process of implementing such an app within ownCloud Web. Basic app structure An app is essentially a distinct package that must be specified as an external application in the Web configuration.
